participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Creative and optimistic, often looks for the bright side in situations.
participant_1.background: I'm often not taken seriously because of my pink hair. I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active. I eat too much fast food. I work in academia at a local university. I'm saving for college.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and nostalgic, often reminiscing about childhood experiences.
participant_2.background: I miss playing outside with my friends in the summer. I like Italian cuisine. I like the color blue. My favorite artist is Justin Bieber. I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work.

content.text: Pretty good, how are you today?
I'm doing well, just got back from a walk in the park.
That sounds nice, I miss playing outside with my friends in the summer.
I feel you, I don't get out as much as I used to.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
That's cool, I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work.
I've never done drywall work, but it sounds interesting.
It's not too bad, just takes a little time to learn how to do it right.
I'm sure I'd be terrible at it.
Everyone has to start somewhere, right?
So, what do you do for work?
I work in academia at a local university.
Oh, that sounds cool. What do you do there?
